title: Jen Harley is spotted with serious bruising three days after boyfriend Ronnie Ortiz-Magro arrested
text:
Jersey Shore's Jen Harley has been seen with serious bruising and scrapes three days after her boyfriend Ronnie Ortiz Magro was arrested for an alleged domestic violence incident.

In photos obtained by TMZ, the reality star, 31, appears to have a huge scrape/bruise on the back of her right thing and another lesion on her right shoulder, as she spends time with the couple's daughter Ariana on Monday.

Ronnie, 33, was arrested in the early hours of Friday for allegedly chasing Jen around their apartment with a knife as he held their daughter, and striking her. He has denied all allegations.

Photo: Jersey Shore's Jen Harley has been seen with serious bruising and scrapes three days after her boyfriend Ronnie Ortiz Magro was arrested for an alleged domestic violence incident (pictured last week)

Claim: Ronnie, 33, was arrested in the early hours of Friday for allegedly chasing Jen around their apartment with a knife as he held their daughter, and striking her. He has denied all allegations

TMZ reports that sources close to Jen say she is claiming Ronnie dragged her across the driveway at the couple's Airbnb.

The alleged dragging is said to have happened after Jen was seen on a neighbour's surveillance camera with Ariana.

A source close to Ronnie tells the website Ronnie is alleging Jen injured her shoulder falling off a fence as he took their child from her.

It was also claimed Ronnie is alleging Jen was clinging to him as he tried to return to the house with the baby, and that is when she sustained the leg injury.

Denied: Ronnie, 33, was arrested in the early hours of Friday for allegedly chasing Jen around their apartment with a knife as he held their daughter, and striking her. He has denied all allegations (pictured October 3)

The source also claimed Jen had been drinking heavily during an event earlier in the day, and that is why Ronnie was concerned for Ariana's safety.

MailOnline has contacted Ronnie's representative for comment.

This comes as Ronnie was legally ordered to stay away from Jen following his arrest for the alleged domestic violence incident.

An new emergency protective order issued by police authorities requires the reality star to stay 100-yards away from the mother of his daughter Ariana.

The order, which will be in place until October 11, does not require Ronnie to stay away from his offspring.

Jen will still be able to request a temporary restraining order from a judge if she wants him to stay away afterwards.

Couple: This comes as Ronnie was legally ordered to stay away from Jen following his arrest for the alleged domestic violence incident

Ronnie was arrested in the early hours of Friday at the couple's Airbnb rental home in Los Angeles after the alleged domestic violence incident, in which he was suspected to have hit his co-star partner.

It was reported police had to 'break down the door' of the rental because of fears over 18-month-old Arianna Sky's safety - and officers then used a taser on the reality star.

A source close to the situation has now told TMZ Ronnie 'insists he was only out to protect their daughter' and his is 'adamant he never picked up or threatened Jen with a knife'.

The site was told he confronted Jen because he was afraid she was trying to take their daughter away from the rented home.

A neighbour told the site they saw Jen trying to drop the little girl over a fence before Ronnie appeared and took Ariana before allegedly hitting his girlfriend.

On Friday, a video from Fox 11 showed officers placing the shirtless Ortiz-Magro on a gurney in a seated position and restraining his hands.

When police showed up, it was reported they were forced to break down the door because the star refused to leave voluntarily.

Family: Ronnie was arrested in the early hours of Friday at the couple's Airbnb rental home in Los Angeles after the alleged domestic violence incident

The latest bust-up follows a string of incidents between the warring pair, with Jen recently being cleared of domestic battery following a fight in Las Vegas on New Year's Eve where Ronnie claimed she threw an ashtray at his head.

The news comes after it was reported on Sunday that Ronnie is struggling to come to grips with his kidnapping arrest.

'He's very somber. He's trying to put himself in a place mentally where he’s going to be able to digest all of this. It’s a lot for him to take in,' said a US Weekly source.

They added the star felt, 'pretty horrible, but he's in an OK space. He’s just trying to process what just happened'.

Denial: A source close to the situation has now told TMZ Ronnie (pictured in July) 'insists he was only out to protect their daughter' and his is 'adamant he never picked up a knife'

Jen initially placed 911 calls 'in distress' after running around the home screaming for help when Ronnie allegedly began chasing her with a knife.

According to a 911 tape obtained by TMZ, Jen pressed a panic button inside the AirBnB in the the 7200 block of Woodrow Wilson Drive during the clash with Ortiz-Magro.

She also relayed to authorities that Ronnie 'went off the rails after doing coke.'

He eventually dropped the knife and locked himself in the house with his daughter.

Paramedics on scene 'checked out Jen and the baby' and neither suffered any major injuries, although the reality star did reportedly have visible marks on her face.

Off and on: Ronnie and Jen confirmed their relationship was back on at the launch of a new line of CBD products held at Poppy last week (pictured)

Ronnie was taken to a nearby hospital to be evaluated and was later booked into jail for kidnapping.

Hours before the incident, Jen posted a video on Instagram Stories quoting lyrics from the G-Eazy hit 'Him & I,' including the verses: 'He's out of his head, I'm out of my mind/We got that love, the crazy kind.'

In another video, the Jen showed off a new necklace from her partner.

'For National Boyfriend Day, I got some new bling,' Jen wrote over the video. She tagged Rodeo Drive as her location.

She wore her sparkling present later that same day when she accompanied her boyfriend to the Verge CBD event, where the pair put on a loved-up display.

The event launching Ortiz-Magro's new line of CBD products was held at Poppy, a night club near the Sunset Strip.

Tumultuous: At the beginning of the year, Ronnie entered a month-long rehabilitation program to address his issues with alcohol and depression

The pair confirmed their status as a couple, ignoring advice from friends and family to keep their distance from each other in light of their recent dramas.

'Honestly, even though everyone thinks we're toxic, she really does balance me out,' Ortiz-Magro said of Jen in an exclusive interview with Us Weekly.

'She really does keep me level because with her I have her and the baby, which is a family, which is what I want at the end of the day.'

The couple welcomed their daughter in April 2018, but have publicly waged warfare against each other on social media with accusations of cheating and drug use.

At the beginning of the year, Ronnie entered a month-long rehabilitation program to address his issues with alcohol and depression.
description: Jersey Shore's Jen Harley has been seen with serious bruising and scrapes three days after her boyfriend Ronnie Ortiz Magro was arrested for an alleged domestic violence incident.
